articles.title: Senegal on the brink after elections postponed - BBC.com
articles.description: Senegal is seen as a bastion of democracy in West Africa, yet its polls were delayed with three weeks to go.
articles.content:
By Yusuf AkinpeluBBC News, Lagos
We deserve freedom: Delayed election sparks protests, arrests in Senegal
Senegal's reputation as a bastion of democracy in an unstable region is on the line as prot… [+8354 chars]
